title: Metadata
description: [Metadata](../docs/specs/metadata.md) is a description about the device: a specification about how the device should be configured and expectations about what the device should be doing. Defined by `metadata.json`

timestamp.description: RFC 3339 timestamp the metadata was generated

version.description: Major version of the UDMI schema

description.description: Generic human-readable text describing the device

hash.description: Automatically generated field that contains the hash of file contents.
